title: Fedis
body:
# Learn F# with Fedis?
![Journal entry 7 splash image, of Shyoko from Happy Sugar Life, representing my current shock that this works at all!](images/journal/7-fedis/7-splash.jpg)
Psst! Have you heard of F#? Maybe Redis? Wanna quickly build a key-value database while learning F Sharp along the way? :D âœ¨ Then head over to this post for the full write-up ^_^ [Fedis](articles/fsharp-advent-api) Many thanks to [@sergey_tihon](https://twitter.com/sergey_tihon) over on Twitter for organizing this calendar, as well as granting me a spot!
